Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
AvailableFor_Description: Automatically provide this feature if one of the listed modules is requested by the entry point
EnabledByDefault_Description: If true, the feature is enabled for new users
EnableInPersonalStorageByDefault_Descrip: If true, the feature is enabled for new users in personal storage by default
ChunkSizeMb_Description: Sets a chunk size used for encrypting files, in Mbytes
AllowMultiChunkUpload_Description: Defines whether the files can be uploaded in chunks or in full
